rComments: This prof is very passionate and knowledgeable,  but DRC 4762 was harder than it needed to be. Get ready to read !! The prof  does not take into account the amount of hours we have to put in for the class, his question are not always the clearest either. if you have a lot of courses during a  semester, do not take that class.

I echo the comments shared below. As a predominantly anglo student, his way of conveying the material is crystal clear. He's hilarious, extremely passionate, and a real role model for any aspiring lawyer. I thoroughly enjoyed this class and can say with conviction that it would not have been the same without him as the teacher. Excellent!

Professor Ghislain Otis is AMAZING. You are lucky if you have him. He is very passionate about human rights and freedoms and is very unique. He gives great lectures and is very sweet. You can tell he loves to teach and cares about his work. He helps you, but his exams contain tricks. His final exam is long, but if you study hard you'll do well.
